dataIdInfo.idPurp: This metadata describes a point-based dataset of swimming pools identified in Pinelands, Cape Town, from 2023 aerial imagery. Due to limited resolution, pools were modeled as point vectors instead of polygons. Some were partially obscured or empty but still recorded based on structure. The dataset supports urban analysis and land use planning. Manual digitization was used, with noted limitations including feature visibility and potential underrepresentation of some pools.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This dataset represents the location of swimming pools identified within the suburb of Pinelands, Cape Town, based on an aerial photograph captured in 2023. Due to the limited resolution of the aerial imagery, swimming pools were digitized and modeled as point vector features rather than polygons. While swimming pools are typically represented as polygons for greater spatial accuracy, the imagery resolution restricted such representation.

Some pools were partially obscured by surrounding features (e.g., trees or buildings), which further justified the use of point features. Additionally, a small number of swimming pools were identified to be empty or without visible water, and these were still recorded as points based on their structural appearance.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Wandipha Baliso, Geomatics, APG, University of Cape Town
